rows.label: tlk70000008_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I got the squad on helping with the
clean-up. And I tell you, you should've
seen how they struggled at it!

rows.label: tlk70000008_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Any fool could tell they weren't up to
the standards of the other squads.
Proper embarrassing for all involved.

rows.label: tlk70000008_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Point is, we didn't get our asses handed
to us in the attack just cos the enemy
was too strong. We were too weak!

rows.label: tlk70000008_03_msg0004
rows.name:
'Course, I coulda told you that in the
first place! Gwahaha!

rows.label: tlk70000008_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Now we all know we've got a problem,
it's time to figure out how to fix it.
Won't be easy, but I'll do what I can!
